reviewText:
Love me some old time Poison. This video is so much fun. Takes me back to the good olé days!
LOLOLOL
Currently watching the tape and its playing perfectly, the box was in almost perfect condition, can't tell that this is as old as it is.

Poison's first video release featuring all the videos from the first 2 albums ''Look What the Cat Dragged In'' and ''Open Up and Say Ahh'', also includes behind the scenes footage.

Music videos include

Cry Tough
I Want Action
Talk Dirty To Me
I Won't Forget You
Good Love
Nothin' But a Good Time
Fallen Angel
Every Rose Has It's Thorn
Your Mamma Don't Dance
